sections.general: program manager & designer professional summary a talented program designer and learning specialist with experience developing and managing curricula across cultural, academic and organizational contexts. with a background in brain & cognitive science and learning design, i bring a strong understanding of how the brain functions to inform the design of effective learning experiences. experienced project manager adept at leading projects from concept through completion with a high degree of cultural competence, having run projects in seven countries over the last five years.
